typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TimeStamp as string,
		Value as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipLines: 2) ~> sourceGPS
sourceGPS select(mapColumn(
		TimeStamp,
		Value
	)) ~> timeandvalue
filterGPLL derive(latitude = toDecimal(split(Value, ',')[2], 10, 5),
		dir_latitude = split(Value, ',')[3],
		longitude = toDecimal(split(Value, ',')[4], 10, 5),
		dir_longitude = split(Value, ',')[5],
		utc_position = toDecimal(split(Value, ',')[6], 15, 5),
		is_valid = split(Value, ',')[7],
		mode = split(Value, ',')[8]) ~> gpgll
timeandvalue derive(recordtype = split(Value, ',')[1]) ~> timerecordandvalue
timerecordandvalue filter(recordtype=='$GPGLL') ~> filterGPLL
gpgll filter(is_valid=='A') ~> filterValid
filterValid sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	keys:['TimeStamp']) ~> sqlDB
